wikipedia_page.main: Harold Andrews (13 August 1903 – August 1988) was an English footballer who scored 140 goals in 385 appearances in the Football League playing for Lincoln City, Notts County, Barnsley, Luton Town and Accrington Stanley. He played at inside left, centre forward, and left half throughout his career.
